select forecast_id,title,forecast_content,typeName ,DATE_FORMAT(last_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastTime, DATE_FORMAT(forecast_month,'%Y-%m') as forecastMonth, DATE_FORMAT(found_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as foundTime, (select department_abbreviation from department as d where d.department_id = s.brance_id) as branchName, (select staff_name from staff as st where st.staff_id = s.operator_id) as staffName from sell_forecast as s
where forecastMonth like "%${startTime}%"

select count(c.staff_id) as clientNumber from staff as s inner JOIN client_resource as c on s.staff_id = c.staff_id where s.department_id = #{branceId} and DATE_FORMAT(in_time,'%Y-%m') <= #{referDate}
select count(staff_id) as staffNumber from staff where department_id = #{branceId} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m') <= #{referDate}
